description: This file defines theming constants and styles for a Flutter application, including color palette, theme data for light mode, app bar, buttons, input decorations, cards, and dividers.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Defines a palette of static color constants used throughout the app, representing a specific color scheme.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Provides a static getter for the application's light theme configuration, styling various UI components.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object for the Flutter app's light mode, customizing app bar, buttons, input fields, cards, and dividers with the defined color palette.
